Name: No. 10 Lemonade
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2006 at Double Seven, New York City, USA.
